title: Federation handshake failures
answer: Check node identity specVersion and registrySnapshotHash first. Mismatches are auto-rejected for safety.

title: Policy denial troubleshooting
answer: Policy denials mean requested capabilities exceed declared policy. Update declared capabilities; do not bypass gates.

title: Replay mismatch troubleshooting
answer: Replay mismatch indicates non-equivalent execution context. Validate pack hash, registry snapshot hash, and deterministic mode.
